mapper.sql: SELECT i.id iid, i.type itype, j.id jid, c.id cid, c.name cname, c.address caddress, c.phone cphone, c.advisor cadvisor, j.name jname, j.salary jsalary, j.outteac_id joutteacherid, i.name iname, u.id uid, u.username username FROM ins_voluntee iv,internship i, company c, job j, teac_ins ti, user u
mapper.select: SELECT i.id iid, i.type itype, j.id jid, c.id cid, c.name cname, c.address caddress, c.phone cphone, c.advisor cadvisor, j.name jname, j.salary jsalary, j.outteac_id joutteacherid, i.name iname, u.id uid, u.username username FROM ins_voluntee iv,internship i, company c, job j, teac_ins ti, user u WHERE iv.stu_id = #{id} AND iv.ins_id = i.id AND i.type = "顶岗" AND i.job_id = j.id AND j.company_id = c.id AND iv.teac_id = u.id AND i.id = ti.ins_id AND ti.teac_id=u.id

SELECT u.id uid, u.username username, temp.name iname FROM user u,(SELECT ti.teac_id ti_teac_id, i.name FROM teac_ins ti, internship i WHERE ins_id = #{id} AND i.id = ti.ins_id) temp WHERE temp.ti_teac_id = u.id
mapper.update: UPDATE teac_ins SET teac_id = #{teacher.id} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT i.id iid, i.type itype, j.id jid, c.id cid, c.name cname, c.address caddress, c.phone cphone, c.advisor cadvisor, j.name jname, j.salary jsalary, j.outteac_id joutteacherid, i.name iname FROM internship i, company c, job j WHERE i.type = "顶岗" AND i.job_id = j.id AND j.company_id = c.id AND i.status = 2 AND i.enable = 1 AND i.name LIKE '%' #{name} '%' ) internships LEFT JOIN (SELECT u.id uid,u.username username, ins_id FROM teac_ins ti, user u, internship i WHERE i.id = ti.ins_id AND ti.teac_id=u.id AND u.type = "2" AND ti.status = "1") teachers ON internships.iid = teachers.ins_id

SELECT i.id iid, i.type itype,d.dept_name,i.enable ienable, j.id jid, c.id cid, c.name cname, c.address caddress, c.phone cphone, c.advisor cadvisor, j.name jname, j.salary jsalary, j.outteac_id joutteacherid, i.name iname FROM internship i, job j, company c,dept d + WHERE i.job_id = j.id AND j.company_id = c.id AND d.id= i.dept AND i.name LIKE '%' #{name} '%'

SELECT i.id iid, i.type itype,d.dept_name,i.enable ienable, j.id jid, c.id cid, c.name cname, c.address caddress, c.phone cphone, c.advisor cadvisor, j.name jname, j.salary jsalary, j.outteac_id joutteacherid, i.name iname FROM internship i, job j, company c,dept d WHERE i.job_id = j.id AND j.company_id = c.id AND d.id= i.dept AND d.id =#{deptID}
select id iid, type itype, name iname, status istatus, enable ienable from internship where dept = #{deptId}

select ti.id tiid, ti.status tistatus, u.id uid, username, password, sex, age, phone, email, d.id, dept_name, create_time from user u, dept d, teac_ins ti where u.dept_id=d.id and ti.teac_id=u.id and u.type='${@com.bugmaker.constant.UserConstant@TeacherType}' and ti.ins_id=#{insId}

select ti.id tiid, ti.status tistatus, u.id uid, username, password, sex, age, phone, email, d.id, dept_name, create_time from user u, dept d, teac_ins ti where u.dept_id=d.id and ti.teac_id=u.id and u.type='${@com.bugmaker.constant.UserConstant@TeacherType}' and ti.status=#{status} and ti.ins_id=#{insId}
